attributes.action: Include council tenants in the grants for Cavity Wall Insulation as private tenants are
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As a council tenant I am not eligible to receive a grant from my local energy supplier for cavity wall insulation which would reduce the cost to £199 for my flat.  Newham council does not have a plan to install this important feature in their porperts which would save us 33% of fuel bills and reduce carbon emissions.
